name: Creamy Cilantro Dressing (Café Rio)
steps: ½ cup mayonnaise (Take outer paper-­‐like shell off, cut in quarters)
½ cup sour cream ¼ tsp. cayenne pepper (this is pretty spicy, so maybe try less first)
½ cup fresh cilantro (stems included, they have all the flavor)
Put all ingredients in a blender. Serve over taco salad or enchiadas.
